\mdSpan[class={math-inline},elem={math-inline}]{$\mathbf{U}, \mathbf{V} \in \mathbb{R}^{n,n}, \alpha \in \mathbb{R}$}
\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={13}
%mdk-data-line={13}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[6c6404adc033dfed51422fdaf7fa0494]%mdk
\mdSpan[class={math-inline},elem={math-inline}]{$\mathbf{A}$}
\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={13}
%mdk-data-line={15}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[f5b4aa61e2f4ae9d4a6723ed1b0c7b16]%mdk
\mdSpan[class={math-inline},elem={math-inline}]{$L(\mathbf{U + V}) = L(\mathbf{U}) + L(\mathbf{V})$}
\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={15}
%mdk-data-line={16}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[37cc71c297f06bdeb86e5cd65ca740b8]%mdk
\mdSpan[class={math-inline},elem={math-inline}]{$L(\alpha \cdot \mathbf{U}) = \alpha \cdot L(\mathbf{U})$}
\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={16}
%mdk-data-line={18}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[a5062d581229f7c6d2ec739830e2f456]%mdk
\begin{mdDiv}[class={mathdisplay,math-display},color={},math-needpdf={}]%
\[%mdk-data-line={20}
\begin{aligned}
L(\mathbf{U}+\mathbf{V})&=\mathbf{A}(\mathbf{U}+\mathbf{V})+(\mathbf{U}+\mathbf{V})\mathbf{A}^{T} \\
&=\mathbf{AU}+\mathbf{AV}+\mathbf{UA}^{T}+\mathbf{VA}^{T} \\
&=\mathbf{AU}+\mathbf{UA}^{T}+\mathbf{AV}+\mathbf{VA}^{T} \\
&=L(\mathbf{U})+L(\mathbf{V})
\end{aligned}
\]%
\end{mdDiv}%

\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={28}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[4e23e72fba9e156fd29054eb3d993594]%mdk
\begin{mdDiv}[class={mathdisplay,math-display},color={},math-needpdf={}]%
\[%mdk-data-line={30}
\begin{aligned}
 L(\alpha\cdot\mathbf{U}) &= \mathbf{A}(\alpha\cdot\mathbf{U}) + (\alpha\cdot\mathbf{U})\mathbf{A}^T \\
 &= \alpha \cdot (\mathbf{AU}) + \alpha\cdot(\mathbf{UA}^{T})\\
 &= \alpha \cdot (L(\mathbf{U}))
 \end{aligned}
\]%
\end{mdDiv}%

\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={37}
%mdk-data-line={37}
%mdk-data-line={39}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[1c9afb2bf76b03c9f3ddffccb280343d]%mdk
\begin{mdDiv}[class={mathdisplay,math-display},color={},math-needpdf={}]%
\[%mdk-data-line={41}
\begin{bmatrix}2 & 1 \\ -1 & 3 \end{bmatrix} \mathbf{X} + \mathbf{X} \begin{bmatrix} 2 & 1 \\ -1 & 3 \end{bmatrix} = \mathbf{I}
\]%
\end{mdDiv}%

\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={44}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[b1f6ae96be6af91159360da22101f63f]%mdk
\begin{mdDiv}[class={mathdisplay,math-display},color={},math-needpdf={}]%
\[%mdk-data-line={46}
\begin{aligned}
1 &= 2 \mathbf{X}_{11} + \mathbf{X}_{21} + 2 \mathbf{X}_{11} + \mathbf{X}_{11} = 4 \mathbf{X}_{11} + \mathbf{X}_{21} + \mathbf{X}_{12} \\
0 &= - \mathbf{X}_{11} + 5 \mathbf{X}_{21} + \mathbf{X}_{22} \\
0 &= - \mathbf{X}_{11} + 5 \mathbf{X}_{12} + \mathbf{X}_{22} \\
1 &= - \mathbf{X}_{21} - \mathbf{X}_{12} + 6 \mathbf{X}_{21}
\end{aligned}
\]%
\end{mdDiv}%

\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={54}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[6bf6e654139d3cb3b039eb4d21931f71]%mdk
\begin{mdDiv}[class={mathdisplay,math-display},color={},math-needpdf={}]%
\[%mdk-data-line={57}
\begin{bmatrix}
4  & 1 & 1 & 0 \\
-1 & 5 & 0 & 1 \\
-1 & 0 & 5 & 1 \\
0 & -1 & -1 & 6
\end{bmatrix}
\cdot
\begin{bmatrix}
\mathbf{X}_{11} \\ \mathbf{X}_{21} \\ \mathbf{X}_{12} \\ \mathbf{X}_{22}
\end{bmatrix}
=
\begin{bmatrix}
1 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 1
\end{bmatrix}
\]%
\end{mdDiv}%
